jdbcService.sql: select en.id as notification_id, en.service, en.notification_interval, ens.last_notified, ens.subscriber_id, ens.id as event_subscriber_id, enr.event_rule_id from ~event_notifications en join ~event_notification_subscribers ens on en.id = ens.event_notification_id join ~event_notification_rules enr on en.id = enr.event_notification_id where enr.event_rule_id = any(:eventRuleId)
